page.title: 03A Day in my Life
page.content: My name is Sarah Pye,I live in Summercourt and go to Ladock School. I live with my dad,Grandma and my 2 sisters. On my sister,Karen's birthday,for a birthday treat we were going ice skating but she didn't know. When I woke up,I ran to the lounge and put her present on the T.V. I went into the bathroom,had a wash and put on my best jeans and a blue T-shirt. At breakfast, which Grandma made, Dad said "Lets go out," Nicola, my other sister, took her roller skates,because she thought we were going roller skating. When we got to the ice skating rink we had great fun. We got home at 6.30. We ate tea and Karens birthday cake. I watched T.V till 10.00 then we all went to bed.
